name: Sourdough Starter
description: Premium sourdough starter for making artisan bread.
ingredients: ORGANIC WHITE UNBLEACHED ALL PURPOSE FLOUR, NIACIN, IRON, THIAMINE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID

name: Beginner's Guide to Sourdough
description: Complete step-by-step guide for sourdough beginners.

name: Classic Fresh Sourdough Starter
description:
Where else can you find FRESH sourdough starter - not dried?

If you love bread, pancakes, bagels – you name it – you'll love sourdough baking. It's versatile, delicious, and will broaden your baking horizons! The first place to start your sourdough journey is with your own sourdough starter. Ours is descended from a starter that's been lovingly nurtured here in New England for decades. When you feed it (all you need is flour, water, and a little bit of patience), it quickly becomes your own, adapting itself to your own region and climate. Thousands of bakers before you have made wonderful sourdough bread with a bit of this same bubbling brew. Join the ranks of satisfied sourdough bakers.

sections.title: Important Care Instructions
sections.content:
Sourdough starter is a living entity; it needs regular feeding.

We recommend no more than 10 days elapse between when the sourdough starter you purchase leaves our facility, and when you give it its first feeding. Keep this in mind when choosing a delivery method; if you need help making the smartest shipping choice, please contact our customer service team.

For best results, please feed your fresh sourdough starter within 24 hours of receiving it.

sections.title: Allergen Information
sections.content: The fresh sourdough starter that comes in this set is processed in a facility that also packages products containing eggs, milk, soy, tree nuts, and wheat.

sections.title: Resources
sections.content:
Care and feeding directions are included with your order, and are also available in our Sourdough Tips & Recipes Booklet (PDF).

Read the blog: How to feed sourdough starter

ingredients: ORGANIC WHITE UNBLEACHED ALL PURPOSE FLOUR, NIACIN, IRON, THIAMINE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID

name: Professional Bread Lame
description: Professional-grade bread lame with replaceable blades for scoring perfect sourdough loaves. Ergonomic wooden handle provides excellent control for intricate scoring patterns.

name: Dutch Oven 5Qt Cast Iron
description: Heavy-duty cast iron Dutch oven perfect for baking artisan sourdough bread. Superior heat retention creates the ideal steamy environment for a crispy crust and soft interior.

name: Banneton Proofing Basket Set
description: Set of 2 round banneton proofing baskets (9 inch) with linen liners. Natural rattan construction provides optimal air circulation for perfect dough proofing and beautiful spiral patterns.

name: Digital Kitchen Scale
description: Precision digital kitchen scale with 0.1g accuracy. Essential for consistent sourdough baking with baker's percentages. Large LCD display and tare function make measuring ingredients effortless.

name: Bread Proofing Box
description: Temperature-controlled bread proofing box maintains consistent warmth (70-85°F) for optimal dough rise. Compact design fits on any countertop. Perfect for consistent results year-round.

name: Dough Scraper Set
description: Essential dough scraper set includes bench scraper and bowl scraper. Stainless steel bench scraper with measurement markings. Flexible bowl scraper for clean mixing.

details.label: Set includes
details.value: 1 metal bench scraper + 1 flexible bowl scraper
